text: Anton Peikrishvili (born 18 September 1987) is a Georgian rugby union player. His position is prop, and he currently plays for Cardiff Blues in the Pro14 and the Georgia national team. ==References== Category:Rugby union players from Georgia (country) Category:Rugby union props Category:Living people Category:1987 births Category:Sportspeople from Tbilisi Category:Georgia international rugby union players
title: Anton Peikrishvili
